ThingDef.label: unfinished genoframe
ThingDef.description: An unfinished genoframe of some kind.

ThingDef.label: Genoframe (Awful)
ThingDef.description: A stable genetic material consumed by the genomorpher machine that serves as a framework for hybrid experimentation. After the framework is used to create a growthcell, the genoframe is empty and discarded.\n\nAwful genoframe will result in a hybrid with greatly decreased stats over a normal hybrid.
